title: Sofia Starts a new School
description: Meet Sofia, a beautiful, bright, and very worried little girl.Sofia is starting a brand-new school tomorrow, and she is so worried she cannot sleep and has a tummy ache.Starting a new school is such a big deal!She is imagining all the things that could possibly go wrong.Will Sofia be able to calm her worries ready for her first day?Will everything be as bad as she thinks?Sofia's mum tries her absolute best to calm her down and prepare her for her new school by teaching Sofia about her magical brain!
author: Casey          Reece
